mass.location: upper outer quadrant of the right breast

relevant_findings.other_exam_findings: No bone tenderness, including in the left scapula; the remainder of the examination was normal

physical_examinations.date: One week after the initial examination

ct_findings.lung_nodule: 2 mm in diameter in the lower lobe of the left lung
ct_findings.scapula: Mixed lucency and patchy sclerosis in the inferior tip

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Marked enlargement of the right breast and thickening of the overlying skin noted compared to a previous examination

physical_examination.residual_mass: 2-cm suspicious mass in the right breast

imaging_findings.mammogram: Extensive pleomorphic calcifications with a vague mass in the upper outer quadrant
imaging_findings.MRI: Irregular area of enhancement, up to 5.4 cm

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Despite a remarkable response to therapy with resolution of liver metastases, residual disease in the right breast was noted
